channel.title: macOS on Fry
channel.description: Recent content in macOS on Fry

item.title: File Checksum on macOS
item.description: Checksum command MD5 md5 FILE SHA-1 shasum -a 1 FILE SHA-256 shasum -a 256 FILE SHA-512 shasum -a 512 FILE OpenSSL MD5 openssl md5 FILE SHA-1 openssl sha1 FILE SHA-256 openssl sha256 FILE SHA-512 openssl sha512 FILE References Check MD5 Hash on your Mac Verify SHA1 Hash with openssl Check SHA1 Checksum in Mac OS X How to Check sha256 Hash of a File on Mac How to Check SHA512 Checksum on Mac How to use checksums on Mac to verify app downloads

item.title: Switch JDK Version for macOS
item.description: Find all of JDK root paths /usr/libexec/java_home -V Switch Java JDK via alias Setup JAVA_HOME path in ~/.zshrc # JDK11 JDK8 export JAVA_11_HOME=/Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/jdk-11.0.14.jdk/Contents/Home export JAVA_8_HOME=/Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/jdk1.8.0_291.jdk/Contents/Home # default JDK11 export JAVA_HOME=$JAVA_11_HOME # alias JDK version alias jdk11="export JAVA_HOME=$JAVA_11_HOME" alias jdk8="export JAVA_HOME=$JAVA_8_HOME" Refresh to activate source ~/.zshrc Check Java Version Java 8: java -version Java 9 +: java --version
